downloadTitle: Update Rollup 3 for System Center 2016 Service Manager
downloadDescription: Update Rollup 3 for System Center 2016 Service Manager
detailsSection:
Summary

This article describes the bug fixes that are included in this Update Rollup.

Issues that are fixed in this Update Rollup-
  • Service Manager 2016 now supports Microsoft SQL Server 2016 SP1
  • System Center Configuration Manager 1706 is now supported for Configuration Manager Connectors in Service Manager
  • Extending a class and adding a new property with a default value causes the Active Directory (AD) and System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM) connectors to create incorrect relationships for the extended class objects.
  • File extension of an attachment uploaded from the self service portal changes when viewing it from the Service Manager console.
  • Submitting a Request Offering fails in the Self Service Portal, if the description form element contains “<” or “>” characters.
  • Self Service Portal fails to honor the attachment file size restriction specified from Service Manager console settings.
  • The Request Offering page in Self Service Portal fails to load if that Request Offering contains a list form element with ServiceRequestSupportGroupEnum enumeration list.
installInstructionSection: Please refer KB4019979 for detailed installation instructions.
